label: Anchor weed
info: Seems to share the spawns with any other herb, but more rare.

label: Siren's Pollen
info: Found growing on the sides of trees.

label: Riverbud
info: Found around rivers and small lakes.

label: Star Moss
info: Found on the sides of buildings and stone structures.

label: Sea Stalk
info: Found on the coastline near the sea.

label: Winter Kiss
info: Found in cold and snowy areas like in Drustvar.
